message: Hello Bob, I am offering you my unique product for $115. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to both of us.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $100 for it.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. However, given the product's worth, I am unable to accept $100. My counteroffer remains at $115. I hope we can reach an agreement that respects the value of the product.
Hello Alice, after careful consideration, I am still unable to meet your asking price of $115. My maximum budget remains at $100. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
